data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article David, Patrick, Vogel, Gernot, Pauwels, Olivier S. G. (2008): A new species of the genus Oligodon Fitzinger, 1826 (Squamata: Colubridae) from southern Vietnam and Cambodia. Zootaxa 1939: 19-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274609
